divs: Sighting DetailsWHEN I WAS OUT IN MY BACKYARD ON JULY 7TH 2005 ON A FRIDAY NIGHT AT 9:40 P.M. I SAW A UFO IN THE SKY. IT WAS ROUND AT THE TOP AND WAS WIDE AT THE TOP AND GOT NARROWER GOING TOWARD THE BOTTOM IT WAS YELLOW LIGHTED WITH ORANGE VERTICAL LINES ALL AROUND IT AND IT HAD A RED LIGHT ON THE TOP AND ON THE BOTTOM. IT WAS REALLY SCARY AND IT WAS COMING TOWARDS ME. IT THOUGHT IT MIGHT ABDUCT ME.
Summary: WHILE I WAS OUT IN MY BACKYARD I SAW 3 WEIRD SCARY OBJECT
